channel.title: Variaton of auto clicker
channel.description:
i need to get a script for Advert Attack found at http://www.neopets.com/games/advertattack.phtml
the object of the game is to click on the go as fast as possible, but then it adds pop ups which you should close to get them outta the way.
could some1 make a script for me? thanx, you dont even have to do the colors. thanx in advance

item.title: Variaton of auto clicker
item.dc:creator: @Arkanor Arkanor
item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

returns from trip

Use 800 x 600 for this.

[code]program New;
const
tolerance=10;
var
x,y:integer;

procedure go;
var
shoot:Array[1…10] Of integer;
a:integer;
begin
shoot[1]:=6721791;
shoot[2]:=5898208;
shoot[3]:=4764927;
shoot[4]:=4698802;
shoot[5]:=6727591;
shoot[6]:=6744810;
shoot[7]:=6730932;
shoot[8]:=6749436;
shoot[9]:=3407871;
shoot[10]:=4963516;
For a:=1 to 10 Do
if(findcolortolerance(x,y,shoot[a],30,314,588,591,tolerance))then
clickmouse(x,y,true);
end;

begin
repeat
go;
until(false);
end.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Variaton of auto clicker
item.dc:creator: @fandango121 fandango121
item.description:
@fandango121 wrote:

did you say your script that u got, cause i have no idea how to script so if u could post it and others could use it for ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: Variaton of auto clicker
item.dc:creator: @Arkanor Arkanor
item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

Ehhh. This isn’t easy, dude. I tried making one with bitmaps, but it was being gay and wouldn’t detect them, even with huge tolerances. So, I swapped out for an array of colors, and it worked fairly well (kept having to add colors because more variations of the star would show up, etc).

Problem was, I got bored, and I didn’t try and tackle detection of the popups. Possibly you could splice some code in from an older script, pre-color-change, but I didn’t try.

Read full topic
